Package sokobangame.controller.modes

Class Summary
AbstractCreateMode Uses the template pattern to allow for minimal implementations of the various create modes (with attemptObjectCreation as a template method).
AbstractHighlighterMode A Mode sub-classing this will draw a tile highlighter when the user moves their mouse around the maze view.
CreateArrowMode  
CreateCrateMode  
CreatePlayerMode  
CreateTargetMode  
CreateWallMode  
EditMode Allows selecting and dragging objects, and adds a 'Delete' button to the tool-bar when the mode is open.
Mode A mode of the game.
PlayMode Entering this mode starts the game, from which point this mode listens for key input from the PageView.
